Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to limiting the moratorium on evictions during COVID to owners with more than ten residential units
Summary: Limits the moratorium on evictions during COVID to owners with more than ten residential units.
LawCode: Amd Part A ยง1, Chap 381 of 2020
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 381 of the laws of 2020 establishing the "COVID-19 Emergency Eviction and Foreclosure Prevention Act of 2020", in relation to excluding property owners with ten or less residential units
